p: The peel fractions were diced into small pieces of 8 mm × 8 mm × 1 mm, which were mixed with distilled water at a ratio of 1 : 4 ( m/ v). After subjecting small peel fractions to steam distillation for 2 h, the obtained mixtures were dehydrated with anhydrous sodium sulfate. Then, the remaining mixture was strained to remove anhydrous sodium sulfate. Subsequently, the bergamot essential oil was collected after filtration.
